question: CIC's Adjusted Net Worth shall not be less than how much per cent of its aggregate risk weighted assets on balance sheet?
explanation: Every CIC-ND-SI shall ensure that at all times it maintains a minimum Capital Ratio whereby its Adjusted Net Worth shall not be less than 30% of its aggregate risk weighted assets on balance sheet and risk adjusted value of off-balance sheet items as an the date of the last audited balance sheet as at the end of the financial year.
